author: raghushantha
body:
Today, the development is happening outside of github code base.

We need to use this repo for future development and release packagesourcelist along with PowerShell built here.

https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/tree/master/src/Microsoft.PackageManagement.PackageSourceListProvider

comments.author: raghushantha
comments.body:
Per discussion with @jianyunt @farehar - we will not ship this provider with PowerShell_GitHub.

It will be available only via bootstrapping and when using in-box PowerShell on Windows FullSKU and Nano

title: Migrate to using GitHub/PowerShell/PowerShell for PackageSourceList provider
